If you love The Harry Potter movies and are looking for the collection on blu ray that you can pop in the disk player and watch when you want, then this is it.  They were packaged in a disc holder that takes up about as much room as 2 average blu ray disks clamshell side-by-side.  I don't write a lot of reviews on my purchases, but this was perfect.  PLUS I got it for 43.00 on the deal of the day on my amazon app!!!!

Too bad they couldn't get rid of the Movie-Only DVD's.
They could have also transferred all of the DVD Bonus Material over to the Blu-Ray's.
Warner's did it with Blade Runner, why not Harry Potter?

Finally Warnes Bros has decided to launch the collection that we, as fans deserve. I've been waiting a lot of time to have this collection with me and I just didn't want to buy the expensive version, it was just too much. I will definitely buy this one.
Great price for all the movies. They are compactly packed which is great as well. They all fit in one case that is maybe an inch thick, altogether. Really great buy!
I love the Harry Potter movies and for a complete set of the movies on DVD this was a great deal.

I bought this as a Christmas gift to myself and watched all the movies within just a few days. All the discs work, the labels are correct, the case is intact, and it takes up very little space on my shelf compared to having each disc individually cased. I am glad I made this purchase and for only $60, it was a very good buy. Cheers!
I used to have all the movies on a combination of VHS and DVD, but over the years ouldnt watch them all.  A set like this is great, I love having all the movies again!!  Potter Party!
Harry Potter is a great series, both the books and the movies. This edition on Blu Ray is especially great and looks fabulous in high definition.
How much Harry can you get in one day? Try it out! Harry and the gang back again and again
These movies are awesome and they came in a timely manner. I love that I could get all 8 movies for about $6 dollars a movie for a total of $48, it was a great deal.
great price for one of the best selling movies of all time.  I would suggest putting the dvd's in a more firm case though for safe keeping.
I LOVE Harry Potter.  It's nice to have all the movies in one box. Makes keeping them in order easier
I had all the movies as singes and many were scratched and a few were missing. I got this set and now they are all together in one small package. All the movies played perfectly.
This is a great collection, and I love all the special features these DVDs have on them!!  I highly recommend this set!!

This was a birthday gift from my husband. I am a HUGE HP fan but for some reason never bought all of the movies on blu ray. This set is amazing! The quality is perfect.

The container is nothing special. It is sturdy plastic case that can hold all of the Blu Rays in there in one place. It is perfect! I couldn't think of anything better for a Harry Potter fan!
I just love that I can relive my favorite Harry Potter moments whenever I want - or have a marathon on a dreary day to cheer up the mood all around!
We bought this as a gift for our daughter when she left for college.  She loves everything Harry Potter and having the box set of movies was the perfect gift.
|This is a really good deal!!!! especially for the price!!! This cant be beaten! And its really nice to have the whole series!

all movies for one low price how could you go wrong. the greatest story of our time. as a huge, huge fan, the only thing i didn't like is there were no extras. not even a behind-the-scenes montage. that's why i gave it 3 stars.
What can you say about a masterpiece.  That it is!  Good Cds  Like being in the theatre. Recommend this set to all who enjoy THERing

What can I say that people don't already know?  These movies are fantastic.  This collection is really great though because you get all 8 movies in a very compact package that is about the size of 2 other movies.  I haven't watched them all yet, but the quality is superb so far.

This well-priced collection was packaged nicely and the DVD's worked great on both my regular DVD player and non-HD tv and my blue ray player and HD TV. I didn't miss any bonus or extra features because I just wanted the movies. Thanks!
This product still works in America, don't be worried about the fact that the title to the first movie is the British version of the title! Great collection and I couldn't be happier with this!
Not opened yet, it is for Christmas but my daughter said it looks great!  I am sure it will be a great hit as the granddaughters are right into Harry Potter.
Great fun! I liked these movies although I think the last three would be disturbing for some children under 10 years.
Includes a single disc for each movie. Tightly packaged in a single case with a cardstock sleeve. Wonderful movies that do not disappoint!
I love Harry Potter, and getting it with all 8 movies makes it even better! Really great deal! Came brand new and all the discs work and i haven't had any problems!

Loved the Harry Potter books and movies. This set is a collectors delight. Will enjoy watching these movies for
years to come.

the 6th movie has the wrong label on it i have yet to make sure the disc even works.  pictures on all other discs are the same. this one even says disc one on it.  its out of place... so if you find the set cheap this may be why
Awesome set.  Now you can see why Harry Potter is one of the most enjoyable movie series of all time.

I haven't opened or used this yet but it came!  My husband got himself a blue ray player and these were the movies he wanted to get even though we had them on dvd.  The box set was an amazing price so this will be his Christmas present.
SUPER FAST SHIPPING! Was awesome. I expected it to be a more compact version with separate sleeves for each movie, not the case.
Harry Potter movies. All together. Available to watch at anytime. Grandkids will get ready for bed willingly. What's not to love?
Love these movies! Works great and the case arrived in great condition.  The special effects in these movies are amazing.
What can I say, it's Harry Potter.  If you like it, you'll want this set, if you think is bad, you won't like it.

I'm happy to have all 8 movies for a great price. However, I've only watched the first two discs and each of them has a spot where the DVD consistently pauses just for a second. I'm thinking I should return it. Did anybody else have this problem?

My DVD of The Hobbit did this when I bought it too. I traded it for a different one, and it still did it. Are DVD's getting more carelessly produced or is it just me?

While many reviewers complained about the bonus materials I was very satisfied with them.  However, the extra bits of scene footage was disappointingly small.  This, however was an insignificant issue for me.  The movies and the blue ray quality speak for themselves!!

Came fast, the dvds are in small dvd box so its not as big as 8 regular sized dvds ( im not sure how many discs the movies are on as I got it for a gift for someone), came fast and in perfect condition. also for a great price.
Disks scratch very easily, which is bad since they are all jammed in there pretty tight.  Most of our discs now skip.  Not the best quality.
shopping for this was easy and merchandise came with a great price  deliver was fast and as promised overall was a great transaction

To have the complete series in one box is the satisfaction that I can watch any or all at any time.  Obviously I like the videos.  Entertaining, well acted and a good story line that tries to follow the books.  Blu-ray makes it just that much better.

this has to be my greatest memorie of my childhood. this is a really amazing series that is based on a series of books turned reality. this is something that needs to be experienced and give as a gift.
Who isn't a fan of the Harry Potter books or films. Why wouldn't I buy this for myself. I think this is an awesome collection to have. Its entertaining & complete.
My daughter is reading the books and we have an arrangement to watch the movies only after she has read each book.  She has really enjoyed the first three books and loved the first movie.

I am a big Harry Potter fan, and so is my wife. I have read all the books, and I have watched all the movies several times. I still enjoy watching them from time to time. The disks were all healthy. The quality is awesome. There's quite a lot of "bonus features" although some people think it's not enough (there are of course those who don't care about the bonus features at all.)

The only thing that I wish was better regarding this item was the packaging. Not that there's anything particularly wrong with it, but it looks a bit cheap compared to some other collections that I have previously purchased from WB.

I won't be reviewing the movies but instead Ill be review this 'Collection' box. The audio quality and video quality of the films are top notch and as you would expect from a BluRay film. The disks all come in a double wide 8 Disk case and has a card board slip cover. The cardboard slip cover is very well made, sturdy and has a foil effect thats pleasing to look at. The disk case is also well made, doesn't feel cheap and should last a lifetime. I was disappointed by the disks themselves. The disks were clearly just reused from the standalone titles so they don't feature a unified theme generally found in boxed collections. Some of the disks even say Disk 1 or Disk 2 further showing that the disks were just reused from the stand alone set. I was really disappointed WB didn't take the time to reprint the disks for this collection and it makes the collection feel they didn't take the the and pushed it out the door.
Well, it's Harry Potter complete collection on Blu-ray. If you didn't adore the Harry Potter franchise, you wouldn't buy this.
I love Harry potter so much and this set was perfect for me!!!!!!!! Can't wait to sit down and watch them!!!!

Use Amazon.co.uk as others have suggested, the shipping is dirt cheap for international to the US, and the set is superior to the version here.  You'll get it at a 60 dollar savings if this is on sale for the regular price on the US Amazon, or about a 15 dollar savings with 3 additional discs if its on sale here.
Great collection--it has all 8 films as described, and I like how they are all placed in one convenient case. If I have to purchase it again once I burn this one out, I'll gladly do so! :)

Is there anything negative to be said about the Harry Potter films?!?!?!?! I truly believe its one of the best book adaptations and does the series justice throughout each film. This set is the perfect gift for any fan as it has every single movie compacted nicely in a slim case. It's much better than having the films individually because it saves space & who wouldn't want a uniform set?!

Great set and a cheap way to get all the HP movies. It looks like random extra discs were used to fill this set (i.e. they don't match and one disc lacks a cover picture all together), so if you are looking for a timeless, beautiful display set, this is not it. Serves its purpose for me, though.
Great Buy!!! All the Harry Potter movies in one solid collection. I enjoy its small design for having so many discs. A Must buy for Potter fans.
I am a Harry Potter fan and have read all the books. These seem just the right thing to have around. Love watching the stars grow up, too.

Well I did read some reviews that said they thought it was not an authentic set but wanted to try it anyway.  Well I got to see first hand that they are just bad burned copies.  Disc 3 said it was Harry Potter prisoner of Azkaban but when it is in the DVD player the movie that plays is "THE POLAR EXPRESS".  I am a big fan of Amazon but this made me a little leery of future DVD purchases with them.

This review is solely on the shipping method...not the movies themselves. The package did arrive on time as specified, however, the case that it came in was damaged. The area where it latches shut was almost shattered completely. Not a fan. Though, it did not damage any of the movies themselves which is the main thing I was concerned with. At least there is the outside cardboard case to put it in I suppose. Just a let down to open it and see that damage done.
Great series. I am so glad I bought this set. I love all the movies (and books) so it is totally worth it to get the set.
Nothing fancy but a great set for the price.  I like the movies and I got them all for a great price.

The collection was a gift. And they loved it. The only thing I would like to have seen is that it didn't show up when they said it would,
it was late by 3 days.
This movie is very captivating... It can bring back the joy of appreciating well written stories even for an adult... Fabulous...!!!
This is a wonderful collection and well worth the money! I watched this collection from start to finish, excellent buy!

I haven't seen all the movies, but I got these for my daughter for Christmas. She's gonna flip! She's going to scream and jump and shout and whatever else she wants to do. All that matters to me is the smile on her face and knowing she'll enjoy all eight movies. J.K. Rowling, you are awesome! My daughter also read ALL of the books! Fiction allows the imagination of young children to grow, because it certainly has done that for my daughter. Harry Potter is always welcome in my home!

I WATCHED EACH MOVIE OVER AGAIN . I WAS ABLE TO GET A CLEARER UNDRSTANDING OF A OF A LOT OF THE
THEMES IN THE MOVIE . MUCH BETTER PICTURE THAN DVD .
Its Harry Potter, so 5 stars.  Lots of bonus stuff (ten or more words required). I need to keep typing so I have enough words to post this :) :) :)
love the movies and they are all now in one set. Was shipped quickly and in excellent condition. good price and will enjoy watching them again and again!

this review is for the harry potter complete 8-film collection(Blu-ray}, this set is complete garbage! I don't know much about tech stuff but the picture on almost every one of these blu-rays is so dark that they are not worth watching, i don't know if it is how they were transferred to Blu-ray or what but i have watched them all on cable at 1080i and they were very good, thought they would be great on Blu-ray 1080/24p, i am so unhappy with these after spending $61.95 on them, I AM THROWING THEM IN THE GARBAGE CAN!, DONT BUY THIS SET AT ANY PRICE! I have a sony xbr52hx909 tv and a sony bdp-s790 blu ray player, cant get much better than that, the only way i can watch these blu rays is to set my tv on vivid, brightness on 68, and sharpness set to 80, which makes the picture very grainy so you have to sit at least 10 feet away from the tv to watch, otherwise there is no detail, no contrast, everything is so black, no contrast, its like they were filmed in a room with only 1 candle for lighting. guess i'll have to look elsewhere for a different set, which really sucks after spending $61.95, im on social security and that is almost a weeks money for food.

Eight films for seven volumes. The whole saga in these films. A real treat.

The second beautiful things is that the same actors are used for the main children characters through the eight films, hence over the long period of time it took to produce them. We see the kids becoming teens and twinks under our own eyes and that is also realistically satisfying. They might have been slightly too old at the beginning but they are truly their age at the end.

Then the films being a lot more concentrated than the books, some elements come out a lot stronger, to a very critical point. The fact that Harry Potter is an orphan is very strongly emphasized by the films and his uncle foster-father along with his cousin foster-brother are ridiculous, made ridiculous, overdone in the ridiculous line, probably slightly too much in the line of too much. They should be pathetic and appear cruelly sadistic and they only look clownish and farcical.

The films also concentrate slightly too much on the fact that Harry Potter is a young teenager and then a young man who is attached to men of all sorts. The story as it is revealed in the end clearly identifies his fate to the decisions of a few men and to the fate of these few men. The only woman that has counted in his life was his own mother who saved him from annihilation with her own love and nothing else. This vision of Harry Potter being a man of many men is very sexist in a way and this world of wizardry is very sexist in all kinds of ways and it is not the Weasley sister and Hermione who save the story from being a mans story for men and only men. Girls and women just have to look, watch, admire and applaud but they have no real role to play, or hardly some ancillary roles here and there, like cleaning the teacups. The books were slightly less sexist and we could have expected the films to change that kind of bias.

Harry Potter is entirely dependent on Dumbledore who never tells him the truth and that his fate has been decided by three men: Voldemort who wants to kill him to be unique and sole master in the world, Dumbledore and Snape who want to bring Harry Potter to his resurrection in order for him to destroy Voldemort, because Harry Potter can only do that if Voldemort tries to kill him and succeeds, though he will only kill in Harry Potter the part of himself, Voldemort, he had invested in the kid when he tried to kill him the first time when a baby. This Voldemort share in Harry Potter is represented by the scar on his forehead. Snape and Dumbledore knew that but they never told Harry Potter who finally knows when he is able to recuperate the tears of Snape before he dies when killed by Voldemort and these tears reveal this secret  when dropped I n the special secret reader in Dumbledores office.

That makes three men, and two will have to die for Harry Potters Voldemort part to be killed by Voldemort and for Harry Potter then to be able to kill the third man of this triad.

Three more men are necessary for Harry Potter to survive through it all. These three more men save him in the nick of time three times. In the Goblet of Fire he is saved by the sacrifice of another student who is killed by Voldemort and it is this death that enables Harry Potter to escape the same fate thanks to the intervention of the sword of his school house. He is saved by Ron Weasly when he is trying to recuperate the sword of his school house in an ice-locked river. He is saved in his last fight against Voldemort when another boy is able to recuperate that sword in the ruins of the school and to cut off the head of Voldemorts snake, which makes Voldemort decompose and fall down into a pile of ashes.

When you add to these two triple sets the giant Hagrid in the back of all these men you have it nearly all since you should also see the short-lived and evanescent role of Harry Potters godfather Black who will be important all along, or nearly, since his elf will be crucial in the seventh and last episode when Harry Potters is trying to bring together the three Deadly Hallows that will bring Voldemort down.

Only two maybe three women are important: Mrs Weasley, Rons mother, in her great motherly quality essentially knitting pullovers for the boys. Then Hermione who is a mixed blood and will be divided between Ron and Harry all along, though she will marry Ron in the end. And Rons sister who will eventually marry Harry in the end. Both marriages produce children, with a third one in the back: the son of the Slitheryn opponent to Harry Potter who nearly ended up as a direct servant of Voldemort, and Harry produces a boy with a triple name, two given names and Potter, the two given names representing the main men who supported Harry in his adventures.

On the other hand there are many nasty men of  course to balance the important good men, but there are a lot more nasty women that make the image of women in this film very negative. At the same time they can never be at the top and have the upper hand. No matter how nasty these women may be they can only be second fiddlers to Voldemort of course, second fiddlers he can dispose of at absolutely any time.

These films make the ternary pattern even stronger than we could expect as if we were reliving the chase for the Holy Grail and its Christian Trinity. The final fight is between Harry, Voldemort and Voldemorts snake, though the snake is fighting against Ron and Hermione and it is when the third student arrives with the sword and kills the snake that Harry Potter can succeed. Such ternary patterns are numerous.

Harrys mother is married to Harrys father but Snape is in love with Harrys mother and Harry has the same protection against Dementors as Snape, a doe. Harry is the son of his father and his mother but he carries some part of Voldemort in him and hence has three parents. Voldemort will have to kill his own contribution in Harry to become killable by Harry, provided he has some help from a triad of students behind, but Voldemort can only have the opportunity to do so if Dumbledore and Snape are killed, if possible Dumbledore by Snape and then Snape by Voldemort.

Finally in the end Harry Potter has  with some help from three friends  killed Voldemort and he has recuperated the famous wand that was in Dumbledores possession and then had been stolen by Voldemort from Dumbledores own grave. Harry Potter, as the third owner, destroys it. It will not have a fourth owner and Harry Potter has three reasons to do it: He cannot possess it (and you possess a wand only if that wand chooses to be possessed by you) because only someone who has killed the person he loves can possess this wand. Dumbledore had killed his own sister? Voldemort had killed so many people he should have loved but he never loved anyone anyway, and thus he cant possess it as he says himself to Snape who is the proper owner because he killed Dumbledore who he loved. Harry Potter had not killed one single person he loved. The second reason is that this wand being destroyed is a promise of peace, thus the end of these adventures. The third reason is that Harry Potter refuses power and that is the decision of the author, Ms Rowling who has decided to bury Harry Potter in some kind of ossified and frozen ice conservatory out of which she will never take him.

A shameful decision for an author. Of course the films are clearly showing there is a next generation with Harry Potters own son, but that is a promise Ms Rowling does not seem to be willing to follow so far. The films are promising it but the book did not and the author is trying to entertain and distract herself in some social oriented novels and crime stories that are far from being in any way able to compete with the great masters of these genres.

The films are a great saga but it is to be regretted the saga has been stopped by its author who is trying to play writer in, fields she does not really control.

A last remark on Daniel Radcliffe. He is a great child-actor and we can see him growing but he is developed as a very stiff character, static in expression and action. That is a handicap in this profession. He could have learned how to be active and how to build a real rich and passionate character he would impersonate in its deepest feelings and emotions since he is far from being a child in the last films and his character is old enough not to be a child any more and become a passion ate teenager. He cant satisfy himself with being that stiff and cold an actor forever. Methinks he could have been directed better in the last three or four films.

Dr Jacques COULARDEAU

My sister wanted HP for Christmas, and this was the least expensive and easiest option. It came in one set, and we watched the whole film collection over break. If you like Harry Potter, and don't care about 'extras', this is what you need.
AMAZING!!  If you like Harry Potter you cant do better then all of the movies in one spot.  The collection was well packaged and a great quality.
Heads up, it's the UK version. That was unexpected. I was expecting the US version, maybe somewhere it says it's the UK version, but whatever.
The package had a little piece broken inside, i really did not espectate that , it is not that important but it really ruined the package
Great product for a great price. The blu rays are great quality at an amazing price. Descent case with everything I could ask for at a great price.

Bought this set last spring and have NEVER been able to get the last three movies in the set to play. They either don't go at all or just stop during the film and freeze up the machine. Of course by the time I got around to playing them and made it all the way to the end of the series, it was too late to return them all. Luckily I had the last three movies on regular DVD so I was able to keep continuity in viewing all the films in preparation for visiting the "World of Harry Potter" in London.
loved the books & love the movies # 7 didn't like the way it started & jumped around, but love the movies anyway
The DVD's where in excellent condition on arrival and everything seems in order when received, it's working perfectly and I'm happy for that.
My only "issue" with this is that I wish each DVD had its own individual case, instead of one big case for them all
This product is advertised with a 1.77 aspect ratio.  The product I received had a 2.4 aspect ratio.  This results in a black band across the top and bottom of the screen.  I returned the product.
Great movie great quality. One of the all time favorites to watch. Would recommend for all to watch any given day

This box set has all the movies. Its a no-frills set so if you're super in love with Harry Potter and want a bunch of extras, this isn't the set for you. I'm sure something like that exists elsewhere. For under $40, this set was great and I was happy to get the whole collection in a nice compact dvd case.
Love the movies. Glad I have them all in one place now. I didn't need the collectors set, so this was just the movie. Great deal.

I had been waiting for a set like this for a long time. As I love the movies I did not want to buy them each singly as I knew there would just be another one to get eventually. I bought this set for about $62 and I thought that was a fair price for all 8 films on blu-ray.
These films and book are a work of art and a truly fun adventure. I have to have a marathon every year to experience it all over again.

Great movies in an all-in-one set that is hard to find in any retail store. i searched at multiple different stores for this product with no luck and thanks to Amazon Prime was able to order this and receive it in time for my wife's birthday

Love this collection. Cannot beat the price. The discs play great in our Blu Ray Player. The first DVD is titled The Philosphers Stone, instead of The Sorcerer's Stone. The collection comes with an explaination for it, and even in the movie I believe Harry Potter says the words "The Philosphers Stone." Definitely recommend buying this collection.

Great series.  If you've not watched it or read the books, it is something the whole family can enjoy.  Gets a little dark near the end of the series though.

No issues with the disks. Didn't notice any difference in movie content between the American version and British version.  I think it's supposed to be a dialog difference.

2 disks per case, standard case sizes (not thin pack). Deathly hallows case is a little wider as it contains 4 discs.

I bought this in 2013.  I still have this.  It is still my favorite pack to go to on my movie nights/binge weekends.  It even has scenes that are cut out when these are shown on tv.

Right after I got this, I spent an entire month in Harry Potter land.  Every day after work, and on the weekends, I would play all of the movies over and over again, start to finish.  I even bought a variety of candy to go along with the initial train ride to Hogwarts.

Many years ago, I was given the first 4 books as a birthday present.  At first I didn't think I was going to like them, but apparently my parents know me much better than I do in some areas.  They were absolutely right to get me those books because even though I was 25 years old at the time, they became some of my favorite books ever.  I wanted to have all of the movies so I could lose myself in the make believe world, and now I have them.

The quality is fantastic, as mentioned they show scenes you may not have seen, they are still in excellent condition, no skips, no scratches...if you're a huge Harry Potter fan, and you want to get away from the real world for awhile, you cannot go wrong purchasing this set.
excellent quality.  The packaging would make it a wonderful gift for any Harry Potter fan. The price is very good and I would reccomend this set.
Gave this to my husband who is an avid Harry Potter fan.  He has watched every movie at least 4 or 5 times.  I would recommend this set as it will be just as fun to watch 10 years from now.
My granddaughter had this collection on her Christmas gift list last year and she was very happy to receive it.

This is an intelligent presentation, compact & full of additional Harry Potter information in each DVD. I enjoy the British actors & love to hear them give their insights gained during production.
My reservation, or negative comment, is that the highlight on the commentary is almost impossible to see. The Headings need to be bright colors that contrast with the rest of the words on the page.
Perfect gift for a "Potterhead"! Amazing price for the full set. So glad I waited for the set rather than buy them individually.
All of the cds have different art work than the originals.  I also bought this for a Christmas gift, but thinking I want one for myself.

Seriously! This Harry Potter after all, what would there be not like? This would make a wonderful weekend marathon affair where each participant would be muggle-born but magically inspired. But even if viewed separately, it enhances the book versions so well you could easily find yourself looking for the Leaky Cauldron and Platform Nine and Three Quarters.

Great movies, terrible set.  Would get a better rating if Prisoner of Azkaban had been as labeled and NOT Polar Express. One would think that these things would get checked before leaving the factory.
A replacement for old VHS that I have not had time to get rid off.  The movie series is excellent and I enjoy having them.
Perfect for all potter heads! Absolutely worth the money. All discs worked perfectly. The perfect thing to buy for yourself or as a gift!
Fast shipment, very happy. Love the movies and now I can enjoy them in blue ray. We took a week and watched the whole set day after day.

This is a great set.  More bonus material than US set.  There is no problem to play UK region free Blu-ray DVD with American Blu-ray player.  Other reviewer mentioned, that changing subtitles with remote does not work.  You have to open up the menu screen and change it there.  It is not a big deal for me.
Awesome box set! Well worth it!! I have watched all of the DVD's and none of them have any scratches or any problems!

The Blu-rays that were included in this collection have a variety of appearances: some color, some black and white.  I point that out to suggest that these were not printed specifically for being a set.  It's as if they took extras from other printings and assembled them into this set.  The extras are also the extras that came with each movie, I don't believe there's anything additional.  So yes, this is a collection of the movies, but don't expect to be blown away by the presentation of them.

That being said, the movies themselves are of course great.

Got this as a gift for my girlfriend and could not be happier with the set of movies. The box is nice it comes in and it is the complete set of movies for the series. For a box set of movies this is a great deal. This is a classic series of movies and it's nice to own the complete set.
Great price for complete set.  It was a hit with my daughter.  It is Basic packaging, so don't expect too much.
I bought this for my husband for his birthday.  He loves it.  I can't get him off of the TV now.  :)

I returned this item because it is not the US Release version.  I'm sure it would have worked just fine - but it's not what I wanted to order.  The title of at least the first movie is different, the ratings are different.  It's the same movie I know, but I wasn't going to risk $50 and have it not play in my Blu-Ray player.  Returned and bought the US version for $8 more.

The pictures here are of the US Blu-ray release. I received the UK Blu-ray release with completely different packaging and UK disks (Philosopher's Stone...). The disks are region-free, as far as I can tell, and so play fine but are NOT what I ordered.
This is a great movie from beginning to end and it give you everything you wanted in a blu-ray it is a great purchase and well worth it to add to your collection.

I read all the books and have just about all the movies in DVD format.  I just thought that this set would just add to the whole Harry Potter experience.  It didn't hurt that we have a Blu-ray player now.
Christmas shopping made easy. Got it before promised date.  My son will love it for Christmas.  I know because he told me what he wanted.
We are Harry Potter fans at our house so we are super pleased with this purchase. Having all the DVDs in one case is perfect. It was shipped to my door on time. I am very satisfied.

All 8 of these DVDs were flawed in some way. Very disappointing, especially since they were a gift to my daughter.
 Will be returning them....
I love this little collection of the Harry potter movies. So reasonably priced and put together nicely. The books are still better but the movies are great too.
Didn't buy off AMAZON, but should have. Cheaper online. Great quality picture and sound. This was actually a gift. But still AWESOME! Nice case for discs.
Only recently have we played these discs.  What a disappointment!  Every disc has a glitch in it somewhere.  Sorry that we waited so long to play them - too late to send them back.

I bought this for halloween because I actually hadn't seen the last two movies. This is a great collection. The movies looked amazing and were amazing. The first four movies for some reason start right into the movie when you put them in and the last four go to menus.. which I through was weird but it didn't bother me.

The plastic cover was broken and the CDs will not stay in. This was not noticed until taken out of the box set. I gave this as a gift and felt horrible after they opened it. The box was not messed up but the plastic was so this had to be done before it was shipped. I will not order from this company again
My son is crazy about Harry Potter.  He's read the series twice and now he's able to watch the movies.....multiple times and whenever he wants .  Great gift!

It's the complete movie collection on blu-ray. That being said, all of the discs don't "match". Meaning it seems like they just pieced together a box set, and didn't make the 8 discs exclusively for this set. If that matters to you, it didn't matter to me. I love it. We do Harry Potter marathons now and then and it fit our needs just right. I am not going to give it a five star rating because of the mismatched discs.
The packaging might not be glorious but it collects all 8 films. 'til WB releases a cheap and decent box set this will do. I've seen this 8dvd set much cheaper on other sites...so up its to you.
great price and unblemished medium in a compact collector box that makes it easy to find and store on a shelf.
We have watched each one and wanted them all on DVD.  The cost was cheaper to buy in a set.
I love the Harry Potter Series. I am pleased with this set. Is is just as described. I am happy that it it the complete set ; perfect for collectors and enthusiasts alike. I definitely recommend it.

We waited until the entire series was complete to be able to watch them. This collection is perfect! Includes all the movies and is in a compact case so you aren't using a whole shelf just for it. Also a great price!

The movies are great, but the case isn't the best. I had it for 2 weeks and the DVD holder's on the inside broke loose of the actually case framework. It is still functioning, but it gets annoying when they fall out of the case sometimes. I have to get them in there just right in order to make the case shut properly.
Everything was as promised and delivered as promised.  Wonderful complete set without a lot of extras tat I didn't want.

I purchased this to play the Harry Potter movies on my PS3, but also works on all other Blu-Ray movie players. I never really thought Blu-Ray was worth it until this purchase, perhaps because I love these movies so much. Extra features are good and quality is worth it to any true fan.

Only thing missing in this delivery was a bucket of popcorn to sit through all 8 releases!

Now my kids want a Harry Potter wand, flying broomsticks and cars.  I think a trip to Universal Studios Orlando is in our future.

Thanks for delivering a great collection my kids will enjoy for some time.

Order arrived as intended.

Had no issues with the package.

If you like Harry Potter you will not be disappointed with the movies.  Definitely worth the price
We didn't actually view the set since it was a gift, but our son and daughter-in-law loved it! In our family there are many big Potter fans!

Huge fan of the Harry Potter books and movies.

The box set is great because it doesn't take up much space, but holds every single movie.

The Blu Ray really makes the first few movies look much better (though you can really tell when something was animated).
I am not a Harry Potter fan but purchased this as a gift for someone who is and so far the person I gave it to is really happy with it.

I was so excited when this came. The insert that holds the blue ray's is a little bit sketchy but nothing to fret over. I was very impressed with all of the features that came on most of the discs. The Deathly Hallows did not have these additional features and it seemed like the menus on these discs didn't 'mesh' with the way the others were set up but overall I am very happy! It arrived in about a week with the free shipping and was packaged nicely.
Love every single minute of every single one of these movies! My only wish is that there could have been more of them.

Love it .Whole family enjoys
Great experience with the entire process. Experiencing a deeper understanding of the Potter story which I am unable to do because I do not have the time to read the entire book collection.
Great price (I think I got mine on sale), and exactly what we expected. All the Harry Potters on blu-ray without tons of unnecessary extra content. Classic family films the whole family can enjoy.
We choose it because me and my wife are big fans of Harry potter. We would recommend this to any fellow fans. It's worth it and it's selling at a good price.

It's all the Harry Potters...in a single set...in HD - need I say more? Amazon had the best price I could find and it arrived quickly (of course).

My 7 y/o and I have thoroughly enjoyed working our way through this set - it's been a neat bonding experience. Harry's tale obviously became darker and more intense the further it went on. I deliberately held off on getting this set until I felt my 7 y/o could grasp most of the material...and not be too freaked out by the scary stuff. I wouldn't personally show it to any kids under 7ish - but your kids (and child rearing techniques) may vary.

I can't really comment on the special features, etc...we've only focused on the actual movies so far.
The box set is perfect for what I wanted and it didn't take long to get them either. I recommend this product.

I know some have mentioned that there are other versions of Harry Potter Movie collections out there.  If you are looking for many extras, bonus discs and the rest, that this is not what you want.

If, however, you want the movies in a high quality format, this set is perfect.  The images and sound are wonderful.

Lower the lights, grab some popcorn and be transported back through the magic of this series.

Would not recommend getting this from this person. I thought it was going to be as the picture but it wasn't. I got a whole different box that had a different picture. He clamed it was the British version. He gave me like a whole essay on why he sent me the British one and how its better. I thought that was odd. Also, I thought it was strange that he didn't put in a return label. I got my money back and just sent it back right away. I didn't want to chance it. So if you would want a British one, go ahead and purchase. I didn't know until I got it. False advertising!
my grand daughter asked for this movie for xmas and she loves it, she can watch it any time she wants
You don't need a huge cardboard box to collect dust, so this simple box with all 8 DVDs is perfect. I love all the films and I don't have to search for anything. It's simple and easy.
This is the best buy for the entire collection that I have found.  Does not have DVD or Digital copies to play in the car for the kids, but, that's cool.
I was waiting and waiting to have all the movies together so I could watch whenever we wanted.  LOVE IT!!!
This was exactly what I wanted. it's a nice slim collection of all 8 movies, I honestly haven't watched them all yet but the ones I have have been perfect quality.

OK, I'm going to say the same thing over and over. The Harry Potter Books are FABULOUS. I use them in my Medical Practice to encourage reading and to have those I work with compare their situation in life to those in the books. And, I give reading assignments out of these books. And I use the Movies as well with assignments given to those I'm trying to engage with.
I own this collection on DVD so I thought that I also wanted to have it on Blu-ray because my DVD collection is just about worn out because I have watched it so many times!!!!!!!!

If you want all the movies and you don't care about much else, then this is perfection. No special features and no bonus material. Just the movies in all their glory. This is exactly what I wanted. All the movies come in one case and it's not a crumby cardboard one. t's a normal multi-disk plastic case. Just a great buy overall.

"HAPPY 61st BIRTHDAY TO MY SISTER DEBBIE IN WISCONSIN! DEBBIE CALLED ME CRYING TEARS OF JOY THE MORNING SHE RECEIVED THIS HARRY POTTER BOX SET. PURRRFECT BIRTHDAY GIFT FOR DEBBIE FROM MY FURRY PURRY CHILDREN. THANK YOU, I APPRECIATE YOU. KITTY, LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA"
My one grandson is reading all the Harry Potter books, so his parents let him watch each of the movies after he's read the book.
I bought this collection for a gift and they loved it.  If you know or are a Harry Potter fan - this is a must buy!

Received the discs via USPS within 4 days. The packaging is decent and cannot complain. However the blu ray video quality leaves a lot to be desired. The quality although better than regular DVD's are definitely not blu ray quality as I expected. I don't experience the good quality that has come to be expected of blu ray discs. Other than that there is nothing else to say. The movie as everyone knows is fantastic so no complaints there.
I saw all movies and they are different as the books, but I really like them and so it was perfect, to buy them as Complete Collection with all movies in it!
Very good movie collection. Loved it! Loved seeing those movies again in one package. Great purchase. So glad I bought it

I was not a fan of Harry Potter when it first came out. I did not let my kids watch it back then. Once it started to come back out on tv I watch the first few ones with my kids because they are late teens then and feel as though they can judge more what it real and not real.
has that new product smell. perfect. all the movies in one box. now i don't have to buy each movie individually
I still don't get the point of this movie franchise. I haven't read the books so don't hate. But does it really take 8 movies to unfold this plot?

I watched the movies before I read the books.  Took a few films, before I really got into it.  Now I watch them all of the time.  I recently read the books, which made me enjoy the movies even more.  Great job staying true to the books (considering the genre).  Can't wait to introduce this series to my children.
I am so glad I found this after seeing what they wanted for it in them store.  I have been waiting own the whole set.
Loved the books...loved the movies when they came out...now they are all mine!  Great viewing quality.  Enjoying the special features.

i've been waiting forever for the harry potter complete series in blu ray to get to a reasonable price (I think it used to be close to 200) i got this brand new unopened set for a 45.00 what a deal. shipping was quick as well. exactly as described. will be doing business again.
It's nice to have the complete series in Blu-ray.  If you're a Harry Potter fan (and if you're not, what's wrong with you...) you want this collection.
It is exactly what it says - Just the original 8 films (as if they were taken from their original cases) re-packaged together in one convenient place.
Nice to have all the movies in one case, lots of great extras too! I would recommend it!  Great product for the price.  No defects!
It came on time...my husband absoutely loved his fathers day gift...and the price was amazing!!!! Great Gift Set idea... Thanx
Not only did I get all eight movies, but it was at an excellent price. Watch all 8 of them in 2 days. Awesome.

We love the movies.  They were in perfect condition and will not doubt be a favorite for many years to come.  As the grandchildren grow and their parents want to share Harry Potter with them the movies will be a great addition to the books.  Of course, no movie can use all the details contained in the books but they are great fun nonetheless!
Watching the movies again in Blu-ray, was something else! Very worth the money. The special effects were unbelievable and so clear on my 55 inch TV.

We already knew we loved the whole Harry Potter series and owned many of the movies.  But some of our movies were on VHS tapes, some had been formatted for TV.  These are all letter box (full size) movies.  Great quality and they were at a great price!
I have read the books and now I have the movies. It is a perfect circle for the magic of Harry Potter.

First time watching the rest of the Harry Potter movies. I only seemed to ever watch the first movie over and over BUT I will say, I thoroughly enjoyed the rest of the movies as well. I would definitely recommend them to others as well as navigate them to Amazon for a great deal.

My 13 year old son was thrilled. We made in read all the books before he saw the movies, and he was grateful we did! He really enjoyed all the movies, noticed a few slight differences to the books, but overall enjoyed it more having read all the books first.

These arrived early and in good condition.  The quality of the sound and picture is outstanding as it should be with Blu-Ray.  I owned most of these in DVD and was simply upgrading to Blu-Ray. They sent the British version, but I can't tell any difference between these and the US version.  I'm very happy with the set.

This set is compact for easy storage and contains the entire film series. A good collection to have and nice to not have it dominating the shelf. About the size of a complete TV season on DVD would be. Came with a bonus poster/picture book of the first movie
It is great...so compact, takes up very little room on my shelf. Blu-ray Collection is the way to go !
Great packaging. Takes up less room on the shelf than all the individual cases. We love it and have watched them all many times already! Great price too :)
I purchased this and the last two disks didn't even work. The final movie barely worked at all, I'm extremely disappointed
This was a good deal for all of the Harry Potter Movies. Yes, they are all together in one case, but the quality is good and just what we wanted to for - to be able to watch the movies when we want.
I purchased the set for my grand daughter.  She loves the movies as she has already read the books twice.

DVD's were used as a present to my wife.  She has always tried to see the movies, but due to the lengths and times the movies showed in our area and her work schedule, that never happened.  She now has that opportunity and has not wasted anytime.  She has stopped reading the books and become totally emersed in the dvd's.

THANK YOU AMAZON!!!
I watched the entire set in two days, not one glitch, and was completely satisfied! hahahah! glad i bought it
I love that all the movies came in one case! Can't stand all the cases....so this was a great buy! My son couldn't be happier with them! Awesome product for the price!!
The film series is amazing. These movies are an annual watch and I enjoy them every year. The plots and characters are interesting and the special effects are outstanding.
Love the Harry Potter series, and this is a great value for a nice DVD set. Nothing fancy, but if you're a fan you'll love this.
i love how all 8 movies are together in a nice small case. the only thing that would have been better is if the movies including the extra scenes in the movie!

This series is great and I have enjoyed watching them all again on blue ray. Everything is so much more clear and vivid watching in blue ray verses standard dvd. Not all movies are worth getting on blue ray but this is worth a little extra.

Oh course Harry Potter is great and I'm so glad I found this collection because buying each DVD separately would've cost an arm and a leg. I love the series and think anyone of any age would love it too!
Waiting for the first cool and cozy weekend to have a Harry potter marathon.  Had all but the last 3 movies on DVD.  Wanted upgrade when I purchased the last ones.  Great deal.
This DVD collection makes me want to "Kick Back" and emulate the "Power of Love", talk about a "Perfect World".
I love this series. Can watch it over and over. Hope to share with family and have a movie marathon.
my kids, who are now in college, have been following this adventure since it first came out.  they had been waiting for the time the whole collection would be sold on blu-ray.  Yeah!
im a  huge fan and i was going to college so i needed a compact and cheap set and this was perfect
I thought this was very reasonable for the 8 film series. I love harry potter and I am enjoying my DVDs!
Great condition and great quality. It met and exceeded all of my expectations.  Couldn't have been more happier with quality and price.
I recently received it and have not had a chance to view the disks.  I am sure they are what I expected.

We've been watching the series in order.  Disks 1 thru 5 were perfect.  Insert disk, movie pops right up (no ads or commercials), all usual functions work including bookmarking.  Disks 6 and 7 have several ads each, very poor sound quality and the bookmarking functions does not work.  Haven't got to #8 yet.  Will update review when we do.
I brought the Harry Potter: The complete 8-Film Collection for my two daughters as they are a big fan of Harry Potter.  My daughters and I have watched the complete collection twice.  We love it!
Great deal on the entire set of HP movies. I boght them before we went on summer vacation and it passed the time in the car.  My kids love them!
Loved having the whole collection in one box.  We watched them one after another and never lost the thread of the story. I highly recommend it.
Great movie saga. I love the Harry Potter series. The image is impeccable. This is definitely a great buy to add to your collection. I enjoyed it very much.
The reviews I read about the case being not so hot are spot on, however the DVDS are awesome, I can honestly say I've watched each one and they all work fine.

How can you not love Harry Potter, this disc set is amazing! It has a really great cover, and transports you to Hogwarts! The case is so much slimmer than I expected and the DVD come in their each little holders which is nice and gives a great piece of mind that they are not on top of each other. I recommend this to any Harry Potter lovers! The price is great also!

I refrained from ordering these movies seperately until the series was complete.
Delighted with the packaging and extra features on the blu ray edition.

Now I can watch whenever I want and have the time, even as an adult approaching Medicare! We like to have the closed captioning on to understand the British accent better, but not available in the first few. Otherwise, I'm totally pleased.
bought this for my son who loved it! Great collection of movies! The family enjoyed watching them also! Good packaging too.
Color, sound, ever nuance of the films were well worth the money. The kids and I enjoyed this set very much.
The movies are exactly what I expected.  There isn't a lot of extras, but all I want to watch is the movie itself.
What can I say, either you like these movies or you don't.  So sit back and relax and enjoy the film.
One of the few movies based on a book(s) that are very close to the authors words. Five was the only one that really strayed for the book, but overall great.
Iam a such Harry Potter Fan. So i just had to have the DVDs. They are good. Sure there is not extra stuff there but at least you have all the movies for a good price. Thanks
My son  never seen them before. So he watched all 8 in a week. He is 9 so thank you.

We allow my six year old to watch one at a time when he finishes the book for it.  He has read and watched books 1 and 2 and loved them both!  He is almost done with the third and surprisingly is not begging to see the movie.  He is now more interested in the books!
ALL MOVIES ALL BLU-RAY SO EXCITED. My whole family loves these movies we are getting a blu-ray player for Christmas this will go great with it.

I've only watched the first movie so far but both picture and sound are suprisingly very poor for blu-ray.

Also these films are NOT 1.78 to 1 aspect ratio like they are advertized.
I am really happy to own this collection of 8 Harry potter movies. The DVDs are in great shape and picture quality is great.
The story speaks for itself. Package arrived on time and was well wrapped. All discs appear in to be in good working order. Perfect collection for the price.
This is every thing I wanted and more! Each disk has lots of special features on them! I'm so glad I spent the money for this! I would buy it again in a heart beat if I had to!
I loved this series. It was so nice to get the DVDs and watch it again. The bluray quality is superb!

My daughter requested a set of the Harry Potter movies for her birthday.  She was not looking for anything fancy -- no collector item type sets, she didn't need any of the many "extras."  She just wanted the movies.  And that is what she got with this reasonably priced set.  Only (small) complaint was that the case for the DVDs was a little broken on the inside. Didn't affect the movies at all, but it did make it a little less than worth a 5 star rating.

If you are looking for a complete collection without added extras or a commemorative box, then this is highly recommended. We simply wanted the movies and were very pleased with the price and the packaging is just fine.
Saw the movies.  Read the books.  Wanted to have the movies for my collection.  Now I have them all to watch whenever the mood strikes.

Once you get hooked on the books, you definitely love the movies. Sometimes it happens the other way around. That is fine. I am just really happy that I got a complete set rather than hunting down and paying for individual movies. The set is the way to go.
This gift is perfect for any Potterhead wanting to relive the magick over and over again. It completes any collection and really starts a movie night!
Me and my family really enjoyed this set and can't stop watching them. all disks worked really well and this was a great buy! and as always Amazon Rocks!!!

This product is a great buy. I wanted the full box set of movies for a good price and this worked great. It's no frills or extras, but for the true fan that only wants the content this is all you need.

Is there anything more to say?  Sorry, but the only reason to not purchase these movies is if you did not like the books.  Which, if you read the books, you liked them. How many people don't like the books? Zero! So buy the movies!

If you are looking for all the HP movies and hoping not to spend a billion dollars on them buy this! It doesn't have a ton of special features but who cares if you just want the movies. I did a lot of research on which set to buy and the only other option woulda been about $300... for special features and a cool case thingy. Definitely worth the $44!
I cant tell you how good this product is as it doesnt work. I ordered it to be delivered to Australia and now it has arrived and doesnt work in this country!!
Great collection of the complete series. Love it. If you just want the movies this is the perfect package for you. There are no extra dvds with interviews, previews and/or extra material.
Big HP fan so I have all of them but not all in blu ray great quality and some movies have special features disc! :)
It's the complete set of Harry Potter movies in one box.  Seriously, what more could you ask for?  I love these movies, and this was a great way to get them all at once.

I have read all the books and watched all the movies. I have been looking for a inexpensive Harry Potter DVD set. This DVD set fit the bill and did not break the bank. I would recommend this DVD set to revisit Harry Potter and his adventures.

Glad to get all the films in one shot. Amazon had a great price. Anyone would love to get this.

great condition, and the movies are epic. first time ive seen em , shuda watched this a long time ago

This was a great investment. The item fits the description and the packaging was perfect. The item was shipped within three or four days of placing my order. This is a great addition to my collection.
all 8 dvds come in one case, plus a sleeve. the plastic case is surprisingly good quality! i have been a huge harry potter fan since i was about 5 and this is a great price for such good quality!
Nothing is better than a boxed set of your favorite film series!  All 8 films in one box!  Enough said!
Getting all the movies together at a good price for my daughter allows her to watch these movies when she wants and in any order.  She really has enjoyed this set.

It's Harry Potter in blue ray, not a whole lot to say besides that. Great movies with great detail. The box goes nicely on my shelf with other collections and I'll probably keep watching these forever.

I bought this for my brother for his birthday, since he is a big Harry Potter fan. He was so surprised when it showed up on his door step (which he had no clue it was coming). It delivered right on time and was a great price! =)

Everything you need.  All movies included.  2 or movies per case so it appears you might be missing some.  But turn the case over and there is the next movie.have not watched all movies yet but the ones I have watched have been top quality.

I'm a Potter-head--a middle-aged fan.  I got involved with the books and movies because my sons were reading the books.  I heard a lot of bad press about the books/movies from a few religious groups, and I thought I better check them out before I let my sons continue reading the books.  I found nothing wrong with the books or movies, and I fell in love with the world of Harry Potter.  (Although religion isn't addressed in the book, there is the universal theme of good versus evil; love triumphs over hate; and self sacrifice for others is the ultimate Christ symbol, so I had no problem reconciling my faith with the books/movies.)  My individual DVD's were getting ragged (I can watch the movies numerous times), so I wanted an entire set.  This is a sleek, thin collection that fits in my storage cabinet easily (I can now retire my older DVD's and have more room to spare!).

Wow, I never thought you'd be able to get 8 DVD's in a complete and sturdy package, for under $50! Very impressed by the price and shipping, got it within the same week as placing my order, just in time for movie night with the girlfriend!
amazing quality, timely arrival, just what i wanted! and so many special features! enjoyed those almost as much as the actual films themselves :)
Great to have all of the films in a collection--not 8 separate cases. It's a nice set. Received as described in good condition.
I'm glad I bought these I had watched them for years but didn't own them these turned out to be of great quality and I saw things I hadn't before. I would definitely recommend these to others.
This is cheaper because it is the European (or whatever) version.  The cases of the DVD's are ugly, but the bluray quality is great!  Movies are the same.  Save the money and buy this.
Purchased for my wife for her birthday. Package in perfect condition. Watched all in a row over weekend. No problems.
I bought this for my daughter for her birthday, loved the books, movies and even got a chance to go to Universal Studios to see the Harry Potter attraction.
We have watched the whole set on nearly consecutive nights. Its an amazing way to sell the films all over again.
The discs contains everything, and the price is great too. it has several kinds of subtitles including Chinese etc. We like it very much!
It's at a great price. Watch all the movies and they seem good. I love the fact that they come in one box so I don't have a bulky box or 8 DVDs boxes. Fast shipping.
NO regrets buying this set! My son and I thoroughly enjoy it on the daily. It came quickly and the price is more than right!
The entire collection of movies were excellant.  My children enjoyed watching them and will most likely start the series over and watch them again.

I have returned this DVD as it was not playable in our zone.  All other websites that I have visited make it very clear which zone a DVD is playable in, yours does not.  I have returned it at postage cost of 25 for delivery and 15 for return.  I would not use your site again!!
Just had to get these with the whole family loving Harry Potter. Especially the wife and sister in law. :-)

This was a great purchase. I love the movies and didn't want to spend a lot of money for extras that I didn't care about. This is perfect if you just want the movies. They all come in one box so I can take them to friends houses and not have to tote 8 boxes around. I definitely recommend this.
Love it!  What more can one ask for other than to watch it with the cast and a few friends.

I love the Harry Potter books so I wanted to own all of the movies. This box set has all 8 movies for a great price. It would be so much more expensive to buy all 8 movies separately. The dvds are clear and there are no previews which is great. I highly recommend this to anyone who just wants to own the movies. If you are looking for a true collector's set then this isn't for you.

I bought this as a gift for my adult son, and he's more than happy with it.
I already own this set and can attest to it's value...
PURCHASED AS GIFT FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER.  SHE HAD STARTED TO REREAD BOOKS SO SHE WANTED TO ALSO REWATCH MOVIES.  SHE WAS VERY PLEASED
The Harry Potter movies are iconic classics and this lovely set offers the entire collection for a reasonable price. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is a fan or wishes to become a fan.

I bought these as a Potter fan and wondered how the quality would be.  It's great! Especially when compared to wacthing these movies on TV where they're typically too dark to make things out in the film.  We're up to the Half-Blood Pronce and they've all been excellent quality so far.
I only give the box set 4 stars because there is no option to ad the extra footage into the actual film as you see them on network television.
This set comes with all eight movies in [Blu-ray] format which is great! Glad that they also came with special features!!
Awesome! will buy as a gift for family members. i have enjoyed all the products i have purchased from Amazon
My son was thrilled that were ordered the complete set. We took a weekend to watch it. We were pleased with our purchase.

I love the harry potter series and I was in the market to buy this box set since all the movie were complete. I checked other websites, and not only was it unavailable at some stores, but it was more expensive. + with free shipping, this seller could not be beat. it came in the mail in time, and I really have no regrets or complaints.

I actually do like this collection, the only 'complaint' I would have is the marking on the discs. I know this sounds weird but they are hard to see with all the dark colors. My wife and I bought them after seeing one of the movies and have been watching them in order to bring ourselves up to date. we actually got them out of order twice (old eyes don'tcha know).

That said, HP is quite interesting and we have been enjoying the series. Now we have to read the books...  aloha

Update 6/3/15: This review was originally posted in 2013 under a listing for the UK Boxed Set that has since been removed by Amazon. I have deleted that review and re-posted it under the current listing. Please note this was written prior to the release of the Hogwarts Collection, which is why that set is not referenced in my review. That said, my opinion and recommendation of UK set remains unaffected. Original review follows:

This review is specifically for the UK Blu-Ray set, which is Region-Free and "should" play on any North American Blu-Ray player. For the record, I have a North American 120GB PS3 Slim, and all of the discs, movies and special features alike, played flawlessly.

Two things in particular attracted me to this collection over its US counterpart. First of all, it's cheaper. The price of the US set has come down in recent months, but this one is still less expensive as of this writing. Better still, there is more content in the UK version. For those of you who don't know, this set is basically a compilation of the individual releases of each film. While the first five films were released as single discs, the last three were 2-disc sets (with, as you might expect, the movie on the first disc and the special features on the second). The US version omits the special features discs for the last three films, but they are included here. Now, obviously, this collection is not as comprehensive as the Ultimate Editions or the Wizard's Collection. There are no extended cuts or 3D versions here, and since the early films were limited to single discs, the extras are somewhat lacking. But for the more casual Harry Potter fan like myself, you're getting all you probably need for under $50. FYI, as of this writing, it is actually slightly on Amazon UK than it is here, including shipping.

I have no complaints about the video quality of these discs. I'm sure the early films would've benefited from having separate discs for the special features thereby allowing for a higher bit-rate for the movies themselves, but they look fine. The later films, having more room to breathe as well as simply being newer, look fantastic. I have yet to experience the lossless audio options as I have an older A/V receiver, but the lossy Dolby Digital and DTS tracks sound great for what they are.

I will say that the packaging could have been better. The set comes in a cardboard slipcase housing four Blu-Ray cases containing two movies each. This is fine, but the hinges on the disc trays are a bit flimsy and the fourth case, which houses the two Deathly Hallows movies, is unnecessarily thick with a lot of empty space for the discs to be jostled around and become dislodged during shipping. Fortunately, this didn't happen to me, but I'm sure it easily could have.

That minor complaint aside, I couldn't be happier with this purchase and would recommend this collection to anyone who wants the Harry Potter movies but can't justify the expense of the Ultimate Editions or the Wizard's Collection.

Most blu ray movies run between 20 mbps to over 30 mbps. Regular dvds run about 5 mbps. These run between 5 mbps and 20 mbps, and average about 10 mbps. There quality is at the lowest end of the spectrum. These are from England. For instance instead  of  The Sorcerer's Stone, Its The Philosopher's stone. Even the script is different. I think that the quality specs in England are far less than here in the U.S. If you can make sure it's the U.S. version get, it if not don't.

Not sure why, but the fast forward is not allowed, and when I wanted to skip all the credits and go to the cast of caracitures all I got was warnings in all different languages, that did not make me happy. And seeing as how I'm only up to book 5 I haven't finished watching all of them.

I had previously purchased or received as gifts the prior 6 movies on DVD - most wide-screen but I think one gift was a full screen version.  I decided I'd like a Blu-ray copy but they were usually around $70 or more for the set so never bought it and I actually had not seen the Deathly Hallows either.  After receiving a gift card I figured what the heck, I'll go ahead and get the 11 disc set that was available at a more reasonable price.  Here's what I noticed after watching all the movie discs (I pretty much had to so I'd remember everything and also to verify the disc were good).

First the breakdown of the 11 disc - as mentioned they come in a "box" that isn't high quality but does the job of keeping the four cases together in a group.  The four cases are labeled so you can see which "years" are included in the case.  Two of the cases have two disc each, one has years 1 & 2 while the other has years 3 and 4.  The third case has years 5 and 6 with a special features disc for year 6 (Half-blood Prince).  Finally, there's the largest case that holds year 7 part 1 & 2 and the special features for both so a total of 4 discs in this last case.  All of my discs had labels and I didn't have the blank or black label mentioned in other reviews.

Quality of movies on Blu-ray - I'd say the first few movies seemed more like DVD copies and the sound was not as good as my LOTR Blu-ray collection.  The later movies seemed better but perhaps that's to be expected with the first movie being from 2001 and the last movie around 2011?

As I mentioned in the 11 discs breakdown, only the last three movies have the special features disc included.  The others have minor special features  like trailers, deleted/extended scenes, some actors talking about their characters and such.  I also believe the Half-Blood Prince had the "Enhanced" movie playback feature but am pretty sure the Deathly Hallows did not.  I'd also mentioned on the first few movies I think they just went right into play mode so if you want to get to the menu you have to use the remote to bring it up to view the minor features or wait until the movie is over and then forward through the credits.  Being the "All" regions versions means you will see a lot more warnings about the copyright as the screen is shown in multiple languages.

So if you are looking for the complete set, don't care too much about having a ton of special features for each movie or if you want a region free version, then this may be the best option for you.  However if you like extended version and want more than you would have seen at the theater or just want to see all the special features or have an attractive storage box/case, then you'll have to look elsewhere.

I am a HUGE HP fan, but have never bought any of the movies. When I first saw this set online, I was so excited! After reading some of the negative reviews, I decided to take my chances and get it, and I am so glad that I did! It came in a couple days (with Amazon Prime), and the price was fantastic! $40 for 8 DVDs... how can you complain? Within a week I had watched all eight movies and encountered zero problems with this collection. Each disc was in the box with its corresponding movie poster image on the disc. The menus are not simply still images, they are moving menus with music. The movies all played perfectly fine. As for what people have said about special features or lack thereof... that part doesn't really matter to me. There are a few, which I haven't checked out yet, but remember, many of the "behind-the-scenes" and interviews with the cast are available for free on YouTube! The movies in their entirety are not, and I bought this set purely for the movies. If you ARE, however, looking for a ton of bonus features, then spend a lot more money on a different collection. If, like me, you just want to have the movies to watch (over and over... and over), then this set is a GREAT deal and one of the best purchases I have made. I would highly recommend it.

Revision to earlier review: I purchased this set several months back and when playing found that none of the movies have subtitles available, as I have a significant hearing problem that is a big issue in my enjoyment of these videos. REVISION: I have since writing the original review found that subtitles do exist for all of the movies.  Subtitles for "The Deathly Hollows" part 1 and part 2 are found as a tab under "Languages" as normally found (I hadn't viewed either of these at the time of the original review).  Subtitles for the other six movies can be located in the drop-down menu that contains choices for the aspect ratio and display items.  For me, the blue tag marked ABC was the selection that turned on/off the subtitles.  The quality of the movies that I did play were clearly up to "Blu-Ray" quality, with each of the movies, up to the Deathly Hollows pair, the movie disc contained options to view the movie's associated "special features" and a number of related interviews that were interesting. Both of the Deathly Hollows movies had a separate "special features" disc.  I have upgraded my evaluation of this set to four stars, from three stars, as finding the subtitle "switch" made a big improvement in my enjoyment and satisfaction with this movie set.

"Harry Potter: The Complete 8 Film Collection"

Over the Spring break my family indulged in a Harry Potter film festival, watching all eight movies in the course of a few days. It was great. I was an adult reader of the first book, and made my way through the whole series, even with the tedium at the end. My wife and I saw the first couple of movies together when they came out, but then gave up after that - the first film didn't have the same magic as the book, and the second was just a little too cutesy and coy for my tastes. Maybe we were just too old for this stuff.

Anyway, fast forward a decade or so and here we are with a kid whose life is saturated with Potter, Spidey and Star Wars and we figured it was time to just go for it... so break out the popcorn and hand me the remote!

It was a great viewing experience, and frankly, more fun than the books, especially the later volumes in the series. At some point the literary enterprise and the Hollywood phenomenon became closely entwined and Ms. Rowling clearly began writing her books almost as if they were production notes for the films. And, as it turns out, that was just fine. "The Deathly Hallows" is a terrible book -- uneventful, dreary, repetitive and full of lifeless exposition -- but the screen version, especially taken in the context of the other films, is quite good. Indeed, watching all the movies together in a short time period was a potent experience, making the characters and their losses and growth more resonant and powerful -- the transitions from childhood to maturity, and the purposeful changes in emotional tone from film to film are more easily seen as part of a purposeful and elegant mosaic. Although Rowling (arguably) may have dropped the ball on the books, her overall vision for the saga comes through well in these films and although Harry remains a relatively flat character, the tragedy and complexity of Severus Snape is impressive in such a mega-mainstream entertainment juggernaut. Chris Columbus's formulaic direction of the first two films threw me off the scent many years ago, but I'm glad I came back to it now. It's a worthwhile journey. (DJ Joe Sixpack, ReadThatAgain childrens media reviews)
